text: (often called K.T.H.Y or Cyprus Turkish Airlines in English) was the biggest airline in Northern Cyprus. Its main base of operation was at Ercan International Airport not far from the city of Nicosia. From, there it flied to mainland Turkey as well as some cities in Germany and the United Kingdom. Its fleet had: one Airbus A320, two Airbus A321 and four Boeing 737-800. Due to the complicated political situation in Northern Cyprus all flights that K.T.H.Y operate to Europe must travel via an airport in Turkey (for all German flights that airport was Antalya). Category:Airlines of the Middle East Category:Nicosia
title: Kıbrıs Türk Hava Yolları
